headline: Here's What Key Metrics Tell Us About Steris (STE) Q4 Earnings
summary: Although the revenue and EPS for Steris (STE) give a sense of how its business performed in the quarter ended March 2025, it might be worth considering how some key metrics compare with Wall Street estimates and the year-ago numbers.

headline: Steris (STE) Surpasses Q4 Earnings Estimates
summary: Steris (STE) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 5.79% and 0.09%, respectively, for the quarter ended March 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: Steris (STE) Surpasses Q4 Earnings Estimates
raw.summary: Steris (STE) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 5.79% and 0.09%, respectively, for the quarter ended March 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Steris: Fiscal Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The Dublin-based company said it had profit of $1.48 per share. Earnings, adjusted for non-recurring costs and to account for discontinued operations, came to $2.74 per share. The results exceeded Wall Street expectations.

raw.headline: Steris: Fiscal Q4 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: The Dublin-based company said it had profit of $1.48 per share. Earnings, adjusted for non-recurring costs and to account for discontinued operations, came to $2.74 per share. The results exceeded Wall Street expectations.

headline: Steris Fiscal Fourth-Quarter 2025 Financial Results: Just the Numbers
summary: Medical equipment maker Steris on Wednesday afternoon reported fiscal fourth-quarter 2025 financial results. A summary of its key numbers is below.

headline: STERIS’s (NYSE:STE) Q1 Earnings Results: Revenue In Line With Expectations
summary: Medical equipment and services company Steris (NYSE:STE). met Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q1 CY2025, with sales up 4.3% year on year to $1.48 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.74 per share was 5.4% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

raw.headline: STERIS’s (NYSE:STE) Q1 Earnings Results: Revenue In Line With Expectations
raw.summary: Medical equipment and services company Steris (NYSE:STE). met Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q1 CY2025, with sales up 4.3% year on year to $1.48 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.74 per share was 5.4% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: STERIS Announces Financial Results for Fiscal 2025 Fourth Quarter and Full Year
summary: Full year fiscal 2025 revenue from continuing operations increased 6%; constant currency organic revenue growth was 6% Full year fiscal 2025 as reported diluted EPS from continuing operations increased to $6.16; adjusted EPS per diluted share increased to $9.22Fiscal 2026 outlook provided DUBLIN, IRELAND, May 14, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- STERIS plc (NYSE: STE) (“STERIS” or the “Company”) today announced financial results for its fiscal 2025 fourth quarter and full year ended March 31, 2025.
